question: The "Yungas Road", nicknamed as the Road of Death, is located in which country?
explanation: The Yungas Road is a 60 kilometres long road connecting La Paz and Yungas region of Bolivia. It is one of the major tourist attraction. This road is famous for mountain biking. It is nicknamed as the "Road of Fate" or the "Road of Death". This road has cross markings to caution drivers of danger.
